text: Md. Matiur Rahman is a Bangladesh Awami League politician and the former Member of Parliament of Sunamganj-4. ==Career== Rahman was elected to parliament from Sunamganj-4 as a Bangladesh Awami League candidate in 2009 in a by-election following the death of Momtaj Iqbal, the incumbent. He is the President of Sunamganj District unit of Bangladesh Awami League. ==References== Category:Awami League politicians Category:Living people Category:9th Jatiya Sangsad members Category:Year of birth missing (living people)
title: Md. Matiur Rahman
